aboutservice.title: What is FreeToGame all about?
aboutservice.description: We built FreeToGame to create an ecosystem that brings all the best Free-to-Play Games and MMO Games into one place while rewarding gamers with free premium in-game loot, special offers and exclusive perks. Our vision is to create the most exciting and rewarding gaming experience by breaking the inflexible concept of digital storefronts. You get more value... and it's all still completely free.

item1.title: More Rewarding
item1.description: Score all premium loot for free, unlock rewards and exclusive perks!

item2.title: Easy Discovery
item2.description: Discover games easily and get introduced to new ones.

item3.title: Smart Recommendations
item3.description: Get personalized recommendations powered by our own algorithm.

item4.title: Direct Downloads
item4.description: Download your games directly using the power of the cloud.

item5.title: Collect Games
item5.description: Manage your games library and add games you want to play.

item6.title: Community-Focused
item6.description: Voice your opinions, submit reviews, suggest new features and more!

item7.title: Enhanced Experience
item7.description: Level up your account, unlock Gems daily, earn Ranks and more!

item8.title: Advanced security
item8.description: We are just getting started! Expect new updates and features.
